column4: I'm getting ready to try out ubuntu and if I like it I'll install it today...
- yeah, i just got this installed yesterday
you mean seraila ata?  i am not sure.  my sata drive appears as a scsi interface on ubuntu
it's because the frequencies that are removed from say an OGG file are very different than those from an MP3 file
yeah, i know (but thx).  it's just a shame thats all.  if i could, i'd just conv. them all and be done with mp3s
so i just man fstab and go from there?
your laptop won't boot?  that sux
yeah -- I need a Mac OS 9.0 or earlier CD -- have to use BootX -- I was trying to edit the partitions... and I borked it...
ugh.  so you have an ibook then?
i gotta admit i like the osx macs, but they're still a bit pricey
I use it for remote X sessions
powerbook newer or older than ibooks?
uhm... this laptop came out right before the G3 (or perhaps the one right before the G3)

i wsn't up on apple for a while there but have been looking at them.  the mini is, imho, a product with some potential.  still pricey vs a pee cee but u can upgrade the hd and ram urself w/ laptop hdd and pc ram no prob
methinks a low-price mac that is descent for computernewbies (which mac has always been good at, imho) may have a market
re MS - all things must pass... IBM had a nice monopoly there at one time... or, well, dominant position, anyway

I think xbox is smart for MS considering what I see as focus... Bill always goes for the bottleneck and tries to control it.  UI/OS between users/ app vendors.  now going for console gives chance to control it if/when that goes set-top.
